root.name: box()

example.code: size(100, 100, P3D) translate(58, 48, 0) rotateY(0.5) noFill() box(40)
size(100, 100, P3D) translate(58, 48, 0) rotateY(0.5) noFill() box(40, 20, 50)

root.description: A box is an extruded rectangle. A box with equal dimensions on all sides is a cube.

parameter.label: size
parameter.description: float: dimension of the box in all dimensions (creates a cube)

parameter.label: w
parameter.description: float: dimension of the box in the x-dimension

parameter.label: h
parameter.description: float: dimension of the box in the y-dimension

parameter.label: d
parameter.description: float: dimension of the box in the z-dimension
